cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaidan

sentence.kanji: 私たちは駅の階段をかけ上がった。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha eki no kaidan wo kakeagata
sentence.english: We ran up the station steps.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nedan

sentence.kanji: このベルトの値段は2500円でした。
sentence.romaji: kono beruto no nedan ha nisengohyakuen deshita
sentence.english: The price of this belt was 2,500 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dandan

sentence.kanji: 段々仕事が楽しくなってきました。
sentence.romaji: dandan shigoto ga tanoshiku nate kimashita
sentence.english: My work has gradually become more enjoyable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ipan

sentence.kanji: 一般の方はこちらの席へどうぞ。
sentence.romaji: ipan no kata ha kochira no seki he douzo
sentence.english: General seating is over here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukuubin

sentence.kanji: 航空便で書類が届きました。
sentence.romaji: koukuubin de shorui ga todokimashita
sentence.english: The document reached me by airmail.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's funabin

sentence.kanji: アメリカの友人から船便が届いた。
sentence.romaji: amerika no yuujin kara funabin ga todoita
sentence.english: Something arrived by surface mail from my friend in the United States.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fune

sentence.kanji: 私たちは船に乗った。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha fune ni nota
sentence.english: We got on the ship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ripa

sentence.kanji: 彼は立派な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ripa na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a fine man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dankai

sentence.kanji: この段階では、決断するのはまだ早い。
sentence.romaji: kono dankai de ha ketsudan suru no ha mada hayai
sentence.english: At this stage, it is still early to decide.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sushi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は寿司を初めて食べました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha sushi wo hajimete tabemashita 。
sentence.english: She ate sushi for the first time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dan

sentence.kanji: この階段は18段ありますね。
sentence.romaji: kono kaidan ha 18 dan arimasu ne
sentence.english: There are 18 steps in this staircase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fudan

sentence.kanji: 私は普段はTシャツとジーンズを着ています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha fudan ha tei-shatsu to ji-nzu wo kite imasu
sentence.english: I usually wear a T-shirt and jeans.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukuu

sentence.kanji: 会議で航空の安全について話し合ったの。
sentence.romaji: kaigi de koukuu no anzen ni tsuite hanashiata no
sentence.english: Airline safety was discussed at the conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukuuki

sentence.kanji: 去年は航空機の事故が多かった。
sentence.romaji: kyonen ha koukuuki no jiko ga ookata
sentence.english: There were a lot of aircraft accidents last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukuuken

sentence.kanji: 電話で航空券を予約しました。
sentence.romaji: denwa de koukuuken wo yoyaku shimashita
sentence.english: I booked an airline ticket by phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shudan

sentence.kanji: 彼は目的のためには手段を選ばなかったわね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mokuteki no tame ni ha shudan wo erabanakata wa ne
sentence.english: He used every trick in the book to achieve his aims.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hade

sentence.kanji: 雪道で派手に転んでしまったの。
sentence.romaji: yukimichi de hade ni koronde shimata no
sentence.english: I slipped spectacularly on the snowy road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hashutsujo

sentence.kanji: 派出所にだれもいないな。
sentence.romaji: hashutsujo ni dare mo inai na
sentence.english: There's no one in the police box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haken

sentence.kanji: 彼はイギリスに派遣されました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha igirisu ni haken saremashita
sentence.english: He was sent to England.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's danraku

sentence.kanji: 次の段落を読んでください。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no danraku wo yonde kudasai
sentence.english: Please read the following paragraph.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichidanto

sentence.kanji: 物価は一段と上昇しそうだね。
sentence.romaji: buka ha ichidanto joushou shisou da ne
sentence.english: It seems prices are going up even further.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuusen

sentence.kanji: 子供が風船を膨らませているね。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga fuusen wo fukuramasete iru ne
sentence.english: The child is blowing up a balloon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenpan

sentence.kanji: 彼は植物全般に詳しいね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shokubutsu zenpan ni kuwashii ne
sentence.english: He knows a lot about plants in general.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joshi

sentence.kanji: 助詞を変えると文の意味が変わります。
sentence.romaji: joshi wo kaeru to bun no imi ga kawarimasu
sentence.english: The sentence meaning changes when the particle is changed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiyoushi

sentence.kanji: 「大きい」は形容詞です。
sentence.romaji: ookii ha keiyoushi desu
sentence.english: Large is an adjective.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doushi

sentence.kanji: 「食べる」は動詞です。
sentence.romaji: taberu ha doushi desu
sentence.english: Eat is a verb.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meishi

sentence.kanji: 「学校」は名詞です。
sentence.romaji: gakou ha meishi desu
sentence.english: School is a noun.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukushi

sentence.kanji: 「ゆっくり歩く」の「ゆっくり」は副詞です。
sentence.romaji: yukuri aruku no yukuri ha fukushi desu
sentence.english: Slowly in "Walk slowly" is an adverb.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daimeishi

sentence.kanji: 「彼」は代名詞の一つです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha daimeishi no hitotsu desu
sentence.english: He is a pronoun.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joushi

sentence.kanji: 上司に相談してみます。
sentence.romaji: joushi ni soudan shite mimasu
sentence.english: I will consult my boss.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikai

sentence.kanji: 彼は司会が上手ですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shikai ga jouzu desu ne
sentence.english: He is a good moderator.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kau

sentence.kanji: ペットを飼ったことはありますか。
sentence.romaji: peto wo kata koto ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Have you ever had a pet?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kodoku

sentence.kanji: 彼は孤独な人生を送っていたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kodoku na jinsei wo okute ita n da
sentence.english: He lived a solitary life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kako

sentence.kanji: 括弧の部分は省略できます。
sentence.romaji: kako no bubun ha shouryaku dekimasu
sentence.english: The part in parentheses can be omitted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukagau

sentence.kanji: お話しを伺いたいのですが。
sentence.romaji: ohanashi wo ukagaitai no desu ga
sentence.english: I want to hear your story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's habatsu

sentence.kanji: あの大学には派閥がたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: ano daigaku ni ha habatsu ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of factions at that university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sanmyaku

sentence.kanji: 列車の窓から雄大な山脈が見えたんだよ。
sentence.romaji: resha no mado kara yuudai na sanmyaku ga mieta n da yo
sentence.english: I was able to see a magnificent mountain range from the window of the train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mujun

sentence.kanji: 彼の言っていることは矛盾しています。
sentence.romaji: kare no ite iru koto ha mujun shite imasu
sentence.english: What he says is contradictory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ipanni

sentence.kanji: 一般に老人は早起きです。
sentence.romaji: ipanni roujin ha hayaoki desu
sentence.english: In general, elderly people get up early.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koushuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は公衆電話を探したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koushuu denwa wo sagashita no
sentence.english: He looked for a public phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuugiin

sentence.kanji: 予算案が衆議院を通過したな。
sentence.romaji: yosanan ga shuugiin wo tsuuka shita na
sentence.english: The budget proposal passed the House of Representatives.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanshuu

sentence.kanji: スタジアムは観衆で満員だったよ。
sentence.romaji: sutajiamu ha kanshuu de manin data yo
sentence.english: The stadium was full of spectators.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gunshuu

sentence.kanji: 彼はマイクで群衆に話しかけたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha maiku de gunshuu ni hanashikaketa n da
sentence.english: He spoke to the masses through a microphone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishuu

sentence.kanji: 能は元々大衆の文化でした。
sentence.romaji: nou ha motomoto taishuu no bunka deshita
sentence.english: Noh drama was originally the culture of the masses.
